    Basic example of {cblindplot}

    basic-example-of-cblindplot.Rmd
    library(cblindplot)
library(terra)
#> terra 1.7.71
    # read the example data
my_image <- rast(system.file("pic/rainbowr.png", package = "cblindplot"))
#> Warning: [rast] unknown extent
    # it uses the rainbow palette
plotRGB(my_image)

    # try the cblindplot package
cblind.plot(my_image)

    Developed by Elisa Thouverai, Duccio Rocchini, Jakub Nowosad.
